entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
